pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Generator of Multivariate Non-Normal Random Numbers // A data generator of multivariate non-normal data in R. It combines two different methods to generate non-normal data, one with user- specified multivariate skewness and kurtosis (more details can be found in the paper: Qu, Liu, Zhang, 2019 doi:10.3758/s13428-019-01291-5), and the other with the given marginal skewness and kurtosis. The latter one is the widely- used Vale and Maurelli's method. It also contains a function to calculate univariate and multivariate (Mardia's Test) skew and kurtosis.
